description: a(n)=Sum{d(i-1)-d(i): d(i)<d(i-1), i=1,...,m}, where Sum{d(i)*7^i: i=0,1,...,m} is the base 7 representation of n.
maple: A037848 := proc(n)    a := 0 ;    dgs := convert(n,base,7);    for i from 2 to nops(dgs) do        if op(i,dgs)<op(i-1,dgs) then            a := a-op(i,dgs)+op(i-1,dgs) ;        end if;    end do:    a ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 19 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Definition swapped with A037857. - _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 19 2015
